name: Recyclestuff.org
description: Free search engine to find nearby donation and recycling locations for household items, electronics, clothing, and more
fullDescription: Recyclestuff.org is a free online search tool helping San Mateo County residents find the right place to recycle, donate, or properly dispose of household items.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free online search engine
- Find donation locations
- Find recycling centers
- Household item disposal info
- Electronics recycling locations
- Clothing and textile options
howToGetIt:
1. Visit recyclestuff.org
2. Enter item you want to dispose of
3. Enter your zip code
4. View nearby options
5. Choose appropriate location
6. Drop off or schedule pickup
